ch.njol.yggdrasil

Class Fields

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.njol.yggdrasil.Fields
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Fields.FieldContext>

    @NotThreadSafe
public final class Fields
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Fields.FieldContext>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Fields.FieldContext
      Holds a field's name and value, and throws StreamCorruptedExceptions if primitives or objects are used incorrectly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fields()
      Creates an empty Fields object.
      Fields(java.lang.Class<?> c, Yggdrasil yggdrasil)
      Creates a fields object and initialises it with all non-transient and non-static fields of the given class and its superclasses.
      Fields(java.lang.Object o)
      Creates a fields object and initialises it with all non-transient and non-static fields of the given object.
      Fields(java.lang.Object o, Yggdrasil yggdrasil)
      Creates a fields object and initialises it with all non-transient and non-static fields of the given object.
      Fields(Yggdrasil yggdrasil)

      • Fields

        public Fields(java.lang.Class<?> c,
      Yggdrasil yggdrasil)
       throws java.io.NotSerializableException
        Creates a fields object and initialises it with all non-transient and non-static fields of the given class and its superclasses.
        Parameters:
        c - Some class
        Throws:
        java.io.NotSerializableException - If a field occurs more than once (i.e. if a class has a field with the same name as a field in one of its superclasses)

      • getFields

        public static final java.util.Collection<java.lang.reflect.Field> getFields(java.lang.Class<?> c)
                                                                     throws java.io.NotSerializableException
        Gets all serialisable fields of the provided class, including superclasses.
        Parameters:
        c - The class to get the fields of
        Returns:
        All non-static and non-transient fields of the given class and its superclasses
        Throws:
        java.io.NotSerializableException - If a field occurs more than once (i.e. if a class has a field with the same name as a field in one of its superclasses)

      • setFields

        public void setFields(java.lang.Object o)
               throws java.io.StreamCorruptedException,
                      java.io.NotSerializableException
        Sets all fields of the given Object to the values stored in this Fields object.
        Parameters:
        o - The object whose fields should be set
        Throws:
        java.io.StreamCorruptedException
        java.io.NotSerializableException
        YggdrasilException - If this was called on a Fields object not created by Yggdrasil itself
